{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WMB54G |revision= |upc=745883568949 |ean= |asin=B000E5E6KG |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/30/2005 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WSPR-104 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=audio bridge |fcc_id=Q87-WMB54G |ic_id=3839A-WMB54G |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8722 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160BBTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16800A-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8722 |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=audio out |stock_boot=rtkload |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.210 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:12:17 |oui_eth=00:12:17 |default_ch= }} ''Wireless-G Music Bridge''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WMB54G}} "WSPR-104_V02" and "ENG-D05-5202R" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :'tis a [http://www.gemtek.com.tw/specs/WSPR_104_Spec.pdf '''Gemtek''' WSPR-104G] This device is using a '''C-Media''' E3DX PCI audio device. Additional specifications, per the FCC manual, follow... *Maximum supported wireless security: WEP *Transmit Power (typical) **802.11b: 18 +- 1 dBm **802.11g: 18 +- 1 dBm *Receiver Sensitivity (typical) **-83dBm @ 11Mbps **-67dBm @ 54Mbps *Unit weight: [[Weight::0.23 kg]] *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::141.6 mm x 130 mm x 95.5 mm]] (matches w/ the '''Gemtek''' datasheet) Presumed 00:12:17 OUI (it's on the FCC EUT's board MAC label).. ==Additional external links== *[http://www.devttys0.com/2012/07/hacking-the-linksys-wmb54g/#more-1058 On '''/dev/ttyS0''']
